span.span: If the has a namespace URI equal to the XSLT namespace URI, then it refers to an element defined by XSLT.

returns.span: Otherwise, the expanded-name refers to an extension element.

returns.span: If the has a null namespace URI, the element-available function will return .

span.span: If the has a null namespace URI, the element-available function will return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限定的名稱已擴充為`expanded name`運算式範圍中使用的命名空間宣告。The qualified name is expanded into an `expanded name` by using the namespace declarations in scope for the expression. 函式會傳回`true`只有`expanded name`是指令的名稱。The function returns `true` if and only if the `expanded name` is the name of an instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式`value`利用`formatPicture`和 十進位格式[擴充的名稱](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148269)。The method formats `value` by using the `formatPicture` and decimal-format [expanded name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148269). `errorMessageName`僅用於錯誤報告，且必須包含的小數格式物件的限定的名稱。The `errorMessageName` is used only for error reporting and must contain the qualified name of the decimal-format object.
